item.description:
Hello All - time for some Hiking again - yeah I know it's last minute - I hope it snows !

We can all meet at the Ranger Station parking lot.
The hike is an easy trail going around a pond. Approx 3-3.5 miles. .

Please bring plenty of water and snacks if you need them.
Dress warmly, good boots, gloves, hats, etc.

KIDS & DOGS are welcome. The rules state that you must have a leash and something to scoop the poop. For both .... the dogs & unruly parents...
item.how_to_find_us: Black Toyota Tundra - Red Band on Antenna

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Myles Standish Hike - Snow, Rain or Shine ! - KID & DOG Friendly
